fields.name: A/V
fields.description: Make sure that speakers are correctly mic'd; that any presentation is visible on screen and that things look good

fields.name: Herald
fields.description: Introduce the speaker (check their preferred title/pronouns). Keep them to time. Get the next speaker ready

fields.name: Entrance Steward
fields.description: Greet people as they enter. Check their tickets. Issue wristbands
